attributes.action: raise Carers Allowance from £46 per week to at least the same amount as Jobseekers Allowance and Income Support (£56 per week)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Carers on Carers Allowance receive £46 per week. People on Jobseekers Allowance or Incapacity Benefit receive £56 per week. It is incomprehensible to me that carers are considered to need less to live on than unemployed people. Please raise Carers Allowance so that we earn at least as much as unemployed people.

We are only entitled to Carers Allowance if we are full-time carers i.e. at least 35 hours per week. This means that we are exactly the kind of carer who cannot take on a job to supplement our incomes.  

Please raise Carers Allowance to at least £56 per week.
